# [Interview #979: Reddit AMA 2013, Entry #34](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=979#34)

#### [evilmegÂ ()](http://www.reddit.com/r/Fantasy/comments/1ced7z/iamstilla_novelist_named_brandon_sanderson_ama/c9fq7qg?context=3)

What time of your day is your favorite to write? And why?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Midnight to 4 am. Fewer distractions; a more serene world about me.
